thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Scorpio Bulkers Inc Announces Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter Of 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Scorpio Bulkers Inc Announces Financial Results For The Fourth Quarter Of 2017
text:
Feb 5 (Reuters) - Scorpio Bulkers Inc:
* ANNOUNCES FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE FOURTH QUARTER OF 2017 AND DECLARES A QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.01 * SETS QUARTERLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.02PER SHARE * SCORPIO BULKERS - ‍TOTAL VESSEL REVENUES FOR QUARTER ENDED DEC 31, 2017 WERE OF $51.1 MILLION, COMPARED TO $26.8 MILLION FOR QUARTER ENDED DEC 31, 2016​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.02 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
